languages.text: Корабельное оружие может стрелять только в определенном секторе, определяемом местом его установки и {g|Encyclopedia:FiringRangeSpace}дальнобойностью{/g} оружия.
Voidship weapons can only fire within certain arcs determined by the slot where the weapon is mounted and its {g|Encyclopedia:FiringRangeSpace}firing range{/g}.
languages.original_text: Корабельное оружие может стрелять только в определенном секторе, определяемом местом его установки и {g|Encyclopedia:FiringRangeSpace}дальнобойностью{/g} оружия.

traits.locale_text: Voidship weapons can only fire within certain arcs determined by the slot where the weapon is mounted and its firing range.
Voidship weapons can only fire within certain arcs determined by the slot where the weapon is mounted and its firing range.

Voidship weapons can only fire within certain arcs determined by the slot where the weapon is mounted and its {g|Encyclopedia:FiringRangeSpace}firing range{/g}.
Voidship weapons can only fire within certain arcs determined by the slot where the weapon is mounted and its {g|Encyclopedia:FiringRangeSpace}firing range{/g}.

languages.text: Raumschiffwaffen können nur innerhalb eines bestimmten Winkels feuern, bestimmt durch den Slot, in dem die Waffe installiert ist, und ihre {g|Encyclopedia:FiringRangeSpace}Feuerreichweite{/g}.
languages.original_text: Voidship weapons can only fire within certain arcs determined by the slot where the weapon is mounted and its {g|Encyclopedia:FiringRangeSpace}firing range{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Raumschiffwaffen können nur innerhalb eines bestimmten Winkels feuern, bestimmt durch den Slot, in dem die Waffe installiert ist, und ihre Feuer{g|Encyclopedia:Range}reichweite{/g}.

languages.text: Les vaisseaux spatiaux ne peuvent tirer que selon certains arcs déterminés par l'emplacement de l'arme et sa {g|Encyclopedia:FiringRangeSpace}portée de tir{/g}.
languages.original_text: Voidship weapons can only fire within certain arcs determined by the slot where the weapon is mounted and its {g|Encyclopedia:FiringRangeSpace}firing range{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Les vaisseaux spatiaux ne peuvent tirer que dans certains arcs déterminés par l'emplacement de l'arme et sa {g|Encyclopedia:Range}portée{/g} de tir.

languages.text: 虚空舰武器只能在特定的炮击弧线内发射，炮击弧线取决于武器安装的栏位与它的{g|Encyclopedia:FiringRangeSpace}射程{/g}。
languages.original_text: Voidship weapons can only fire within certain arcs determined by the slot where the weapon is mounted and its {g|Encyclopedia:FiringRangeSpace}firing range{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 虚空舰武器只能在特定的炮击弧线内发射，炮击弧线取决于武器安装的栏位与它的{g|Encyclopedia:Range}射程{/g}。

languages.text: Las armas de nave del vacío solo pueden disparar siguiendo ciertos arcos, determinados por la ranura en la que se encuentren instaladas y su {g|Encyclopedia:FiringRangeSpace}alcance de disparo{/g}.
languages.original_text: Voidship weapons can only fire within certain arcs determined by the slot where the weapon is mounted and its {g|Encyclopedia:FiringRangeSpace}firing range{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Las armas de nave del vacío solo pueden disparar siguiendo ciertos arcos, determinados por la ranura en la que se encuentren instaladas y su {g|Encyclopedia:Range}alcance{/g} de disparo.

languages.original_text: Shipboard weapons can only fire in a specific sector determined by their mounting location and the range of the weapon.

languages.text: ヴォイドシップの武器は、その武器が搭載されているスロットに応じた特定の範囲内および{g|Encyclopedia:FiringRangeSpace}射程距離{/g}内にしか発射できない。
languages.original_text: Voidship weapons can only fire within certain arcs determined by the slot where the weapon is mounted and its {g|Encyclopedia:FiringRangeSpace}firing range{/g}.

traits.locale_text: ヴォイドシップの武器は、その武器が搭載されているスロットに応じた特定の範囲内および射程{g|Encyclopedia:Range}距離{/g}内にしか発射できない。

languages.text: Uçsuz gemisi silahları, silahın monte edildiği yuva ve {g|Encyclopedia:FiringRangeSpace}atış menzili{/g} tarafından belirlenen belirli yaylar dâhilinde atış yapabilirler.
languages.original_text: Voidship weapons can only fire within certain arcs determined by the slot where the weapon is mounted and its {g|Encyclopedia:FiringRangeSpace}firing range{/g}.
